name: rrxtop
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, ctop), wcel(cfv(crrx, c0), ctps))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ Top, (RR^ ` c0)∈ TopSp)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, ctop))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(crrx, c0), ctps))
-| wi(wcel(cfv(crrx, c0), ctps), wcel(c2, ctop))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 ∈ Top)
⊣ (c0 ∈ c1 →(RR^ ` c0)∈ TopSp)
⊣ ((RR^ ` c0)∈ TopSp → c2 ∈ Top)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, ctop))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(crrx, c0), ctps))
-| wi(wcel(cfv(crrx, c0), ctps), wcel(c2, ctop))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 ∈ Top)
⊣ (c0 ∈ c1 →(RR^ ` c0)∈ TopSp)
⊣ ((RR^ ` c0)∈ TopSp → c2 ∈ Top)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, ctop))
-| wi(wcel(cfv(crrx, c0), ctps), wcel(c2, ctop))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 ∈ Top)
⊣ ((RR^ ` c0)∈ TopSp → c2 ∈ Top)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cfv(crrx, c0), ctps), wcel(c2, ctop))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, cfv(crrx, c0)))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((RR^ ` c0)∈ TopSp → c2 ∈ Top)
⊣ c2 =(TopOpen `(RR^ ` c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, ctop))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, cfv(crrx, c0)))

comment: The topology on generalized Euclidean real spaces. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 24-Dec-2020.)
